question: Which institution has partnered with Atal Innovation Mission to promote innovation and entrepreneurship?
option1: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, CSIR
option2: Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, TIFR
answer: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, CSIR
explanation:
Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, CSIR has partnered with Atal Innovation Mission, AIM to promote a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship in various sectors.
Under the Letter of Intent signed, the two institutions would support world class start-ups and promote innovation and research in the MSME industry through CSIR incubators and ARISE initiative of AIM. They will also work together on new models of innovation like CSIR Innovation parks.
